title: [$500] Assign Task - The app crashes when canceling a task in offline mode

labels.name: External
labels.description: Added to denote the issue can be worked on by a contributor

labels.name: Bug
labels.description: Something is broken. Auto assigns a BugZero manager.

comments.body: Triggered auto assignment to @sonialiap (`Bug`), see https://stackoverflow.com/c/expensify/questions/14418 for more details.

### Bug0 Triage Checklist ([Main S/O](https://stackoverflowteams.com/c/expensify/questions/14418))

- [ ] This "bug" occurs on a supported platform (ensure `Platforms` in OP are ✅)
- [ ] This bug is not a duplicate report (check [E/App issues](https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues) and [#expensify-bugs](https://expensify.slack.com/archives/C049HHMV9SM))
    - If it is, comment with a link to the original report, close the issue and add any novel details to the original issue instead
- [ ] This bug is reproducible using the reproduction steps in the OP. [S/O](https://stackoverflowteams.com/c/expensify/questions/14418#:~:text=The%20bug%20is%20reproducible)
    - If the reproduction steps are clear and you're unable to reproduce the bug, check with the reporter and QA first, then close the issue.
    - If the reproduction steps aren't clear and you determine the correct steps, please update the OP.
- [ ] This issue is filled out as thoroughly and clearly as possible
    - Pay special attention to the title, results, platforms where the bug occurs, and if the bug happens on staging/production.
- [ ] I have reviewed and subscribed to the linked Slack conversation to ensure Slack/Github stay in sync
Triggered auto assignment to Contributor-plus team member for initial proposal review - @narefyev91 (`External`)

## Proposal ### Please re-state the problem that we are trying to solve in this issue. App crashes on canceling a task in offline mode ### What is the root cause of that problem? The app throws the following err in this line: https://github.com/Expensify/App/blob/f5bfd452174590dd7d872c585f188ecd04fe2b13/src/libs/actions/Task.js#L761 this happens because the `getLastVisibleAction` function returns null in this line with resulting in the prev err: https://github.com/Expensify/App/blob/80ea5ca2588c0ad6211dacf2785942109707453a/src/libs/ReportActionsUtils.ts#L394-L396 ### What changes do you think we should make in order to solve the problem? use lodash to access the `.created` prop as we are doing [here](https://github.com/Expensify/App/blob/3e59d001bfe7ef605e6ce3779bd62d4b6a669cda/src/libs/actions/IOU.js#L2070) ``` lastVisibleActionCreated: lodashGet(ReportActionsUtils.getLastVisibleAction(parentReport.reportID, optimisticReportActions),'created'), ```

## Proposal

### Please re-state the problem that we are trying to solve in this issue.
App crashes when canceling a task in offline mode

### What is the root cause of that problem?
When we receive a task and go offline before visiting the task report, this report will have no report action.

So `getLastVisibleAction` return null
 https://github.com/Expensify/App/blob/8c909d1a0b1c16d3130cc6d220f656f2ba9b2bdd/src/libs/ReportActionsUtils.ts#L394-L396
and then the app crashes here
https://github.com/Expensify/App/blob/8c909d1a0b1c16d3130cc6d220f656f2ba9b2bdd/src/libs/actions/Task.js#L761




### What changes do you think we should make in order to solve the problem?
If `sortedReportActions` is an empty array we should return an empty object instead of returning `null`. That can make sure that all places that use `getLastVisibleAction` will not make the app crash
 https://github.com/Expensify/App/blob/8c909d1a0b1c16d3130cc6d220f656f2ba9b2bdd/src/libs/ReportActionsUtils.ts#L394-L396

We also need to check all places are calling this function to see if it is used like `action.key1.key2` we should use `lodashGet` for this.
### What alternative solutions did you explore? (Optional)

Proposal from @abzokhattab looks good to me https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/31587#issuecomment-1819893376
We should just fix correct usage for lastVisibleActionCreated
Based on this PR https://github.com/Expensify/App/pull/28570/files - we already moved away from returning {} (which will break TS paradigm for that function and may lead to more regressions @dukenv0307 based on your suggestion)
Problem also was not discovered before because not everything are in TS. That's why error was not caught.
Also my suggestion will be to add more unit test here tests/unit/ReportActionsUtilsTest.js for getLastVisibleAction function
🎀 👀 🎀 C+ reviewed
Triggered auto assignment to @arosiclair, see https://stackoverflow.com/c/expensify/questions/7972 for more details.

📣 @abzokhattab 🎉 An offer has been automatically sent to your Upwork account for the Contributor role 🎉 Thanks for contributing to the Expensify app!

[Offer link](https://www.upwork.com/nx/wm/offer/27770841)
[Upwork job](https://www.upwork.com/jobs/~01a371f1783ea64c60)
Please accept the offer and leave a comment on the Github issue letting us know when we can expect a PR to be ready for review 🧑‍💻
Keep in mind: [Code of Conduct](https://github.com/Expensify/App/blob/main/CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md) | [Contributing](https://github.com/Expensify/App/blob/main/contributingGuides/CONTRIBUTING.md) 📖

body:
If you haven’t already, check out our [contributing guidelines](https://github.com/Expensify/ReactNativeChat/blob/main/contributingGuides/CONTRIBUTING.md) for onboarding and email contributors@expensify.com to request to join our Slack channel! ___ **Version Number:** 1.4.1-4 **Reproducible in staging?:** Y **Reproducible in production?:** Y **If this was caught during regression testing, add the test name, ID and link from TestRail:** **Email or phone of affected tester (no customers):** **Logs:** https://stackoverflow.com/c/expensify/questions/4856 **Expensify/Expensify Issue URL:** **Issue reported by:** Applause - Internal Team **Slack conversation:** ## Action Performed: Pre-condition: In LHN task received on previous date with green dot is required 1. Launch app 2. Tap on profile---Preferences 3. Toggle on forced offline 4. Navigaye to LHN 5. Tap on task received on previous dates with greet dot 6. Tap on 3 dots on top right 7. Tap cancel ## Expected Result: PAs receiver of task login and cancel task in offline, app must not crash ## Actual Result: The app crashes when canceling a task in offline mode ## Workaround: Unknown ## Platforms: Which of our officially supported platforms is this issue occurring on? - [x] Android: Native - [x] Android: mWeb Chrome - [ ] iOS: Native - [ ] iOS: mWeb Safari - [x] MacOS: Chrome / Safari - [ ] MacOS: Desktop ## Screenshots/Videos Add any screenshot/video evidence https://github.com/Expensify/App/assets/78819774/3e27e0c0-bc67-40ab-9bb8-85a32a8e7e5e [View all open jobs on GitHub](https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3A%22Help+Wanted%22)
